headline: Danaher Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: Danaher Corporation (NYSE: DHR) announced today that its Board of Directors has approved a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.32 per share of its common stock, payable on July 25, 2025 to holders of record on June 27, 2025.

raw.headline: Danaher Announces Quarterly Dividend
raw.summary: Danaher Corporation (NYSE: DHR) announced today that its Board of Directors has approved a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.32 per share of its common stock, payable on July 25, 2025 to holders of record on June 27, 2025.

headline: Danaher: A Capital Intensive Business Offering Low Risk, Low Reward Opportunity
summary: Danaher Corp.'s intrinsic value shows 14% upside, but challenges like high debt & low growth reduce its investment appeal.
